fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, Heal a player, giving them powerful defense for the night and curing poison.
- At night, you may perform Botched Surgery on a player you've successfully protected from an attack. Their defense permanently is now Vulnerable.
- At night, you may falsely Heal a player, making it appear as if they were attacked and protected.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can only heal yourself once.
- Retain your Background upon being converted.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate those you wish to not convert, or those who will not join you.
